alert.note: Alert for Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued May 08 at 11:35PM MDT until May 09 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 50 mph with gusts up to 80 mph expected. Strongest winds west of I-25. * WHERE...Trinidad and Vicinity. * WHEN...Until noon MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft
